text.section: Any person who intentionally violates any provision of this chapter, other than KRS 605.080(4), shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor.
Any person who intentionally violates KRS 605.080(4), shall be guilty of a violation.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 272, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 13, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 19, effective July 1, 1987.
